    Tarantulas looks to the red devil as he sets down next to him. 
Terrorsaur, after all, was a skilled fighter and obviously wise to come into 
this fold.
    "So, your with me, excellent. I could use a partner like 
yourself....between me and you, I plan on finding Megatron. At least he has 
ambition, instead of just pointless battles."
    He then turned to Kitkat, "So, what is your answer?!"

    Megatron drew back in suspicion as Adrax opened the door and looked down 
on them. He didnt look thrilled to see them....
    "Two fools from the valley. Why do you bother us/ we want to be left in 
solitude!" Adrax yelled.
    Megatron turned on the charm. "Ah, Adrax! Long time scince...well...who 
can remember. Listen, I need a place to lay low for awhile..."
    Adrax glared. "You want a place to be safe while you plot the demise of 
the Maximlas....and Predacons."
    "You know about that?"
    "Yes, Autofire and myself keep track of theres things."
    "Oh, yes. Of course..."
    Meg's trailed off. He didnt know what to do. He had to stay here, there 
was no where else. "If you let us stay, we will work to join the Predacons as 
one. I swaer on my rank."
    "You have no rank scum! But....with a large group of Predacons, we would 
dominate and bring all this mess under order." Adrax pondered.
    "Yes, we would. How bout it?" Megatron said with a smile.
    Adrax said nothing, and opened the door.
